entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 3:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: SE 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain and ending this evening then cloudy with flurries beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or a few local snow squalls ending after midnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
